name: Return to your roots, Teo Tooth!
name_original: Return to your roots, Teo Tooth!
description:
A very blursed game about a tooth returning home. Damage the tapeworm by jumping against its stomach.

Made for the Finnish Game Jam 2023 / Global Game Jam 2023 with the theme Roots.

Programming by WindySilver, Lumi-Orkidea and Miksu98.

Graphics by nofuu.

Audio by Blingley.
